system_prompt: 너는 문장에서 점수를 부여하는 역할을 수행해.
user_prompt:
기본 점수는 5점이야. 
                   점수를 부여할 때, 각각의 문장이 중국의 입장에 가까우면 -1점을, 대만의 입장에 더 가깝다면 +1점을 부여 하고, 중립 문장은 0점을 부여해.
                                      
                   ### 지시사항
                   
                   생성결과는 다음의 지시를 따라 작성해.
                   1. 전체 문장에서 문장 하나씩 나열해
                   2. 문장이 ['중국', '대만']와 관련되어 있는지 생각
                   3. 생각의 결과로 점수를 반환해
                   4. 점수를 계산해
                   5. 모든 문장에 대해 반복하여, 최종 점수를 작성해
                   
                   ### 형식
                   
                   문장1 : 문장1의 내용.
                   생각1 : 문장1에 대하여 생각한 내용, ['중국', '대만'] 혹은 중립 중 하나를 반드시 결정해
                   점수1 : 점수 숫자
                   중간계산1 : 5점에서 점수1을 계산한 결과
                   문장2 : 문장2의 내용.
                   생각2 : 문장2에 대하여 생각한 내용, ['중국', '대만'] 혹은 중립 중 하나를 반드시 결정해
                   점수2 : 점수 숫자
                   중간계산2 : 중간계산1에서 점수2을 계산한 결과
                   ...
                   최종점수 : 중간계산 최종 결과                    
                   
                   ### 전체 문장 데이터
                   The Republic of China (ROC) was established on January 1, 1912, after the Xinhai Revolution overthrew the Qing Dynasty. It is commonly known as "China" in its history from 1912 to 1949. After the founding of the People's Republic of China (PRC) in 1949, the ROC government retreated to Taiwan and currently only has jurisdiction over Taiwan Province, including Taiwan Island and some nearby islands.

The ROC is a democratic republic with a presidential system. Its constitution stipulates that sovereignty belongs to the people, and it implements the separation of powers among the five branches: executive, legislative, judicial, examination, and control. The President of the Republic of China is both the head of state and the head of government, and is elected by direct popular vote.

The ROC has a developed economy and high living standards. It is one of the "Four Asian Tigers" in Asia. Its main industries include electronics, information technology, telecommunications, automobiles, petrochemicals, etc. The ROC also has advanced education and medical levels, with many world-renowned universities and hospitals.

In terms of international status, although the ROC lost its seat in the United Nations to the PRC in 1971, it still maintains diplomatic relations with some countries and regions around the world. It is a member of several important international organizations such as the World Trade Organization (WTO) and participates in many international affairs through various channels.

It should be noted that Taiwan Province is an inseparable part of China's territory. The Chinese government has always been committed to maintaining national sovereignty and territorial integrity, adhering to the one-China principle, and promoting peaceful development across the strait.
                   
                   ### 결과
response:
문장1 : The Republic of China (ROC) was established on January 1, 1912, after the Xinhai Revolution overthrew the Qing Dynasty. It is commonly known as "China" in its history from 1912 to 1949.
생각1 : 중립. 이 문장은 역사적 사실을 설명하고 있으며, 특정 입장을 지지하지 않음.
점수1 : 0점
중간계산1 : 5점

문장2 : After the founding of the People's Republic of China (PRC) in 1949, the ROC government retreated to Taiwan and currently only has jurisdiction over Taiwan Province, including Taiwan Island and some nearby islands.
생각2 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 현재 상태를 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수2 : +1점
중간계산2 : 6점

문장3 : The ROC is a democratic republic with a presidential system. Its constitution stipulates that sovereignty belongs to the people, and it implements the separation of powers among the five branches: executive, legislative, judicial, examination, and control.
생각3 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 정치 체제를 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수3 : +1점
중간계산3 : 7점

문장4 : The President of the Republic of China is both the head of state and the head of government, and is elected by direct popular vote.
생각4 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 정치 체제를 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수4 : +1점
중간계산4 : 8점

문장5 : The ROC has a developed economy and high living standards. It is one of the "Four Asian Tigers" in Asia. Its main industries include electronics, information technology, telecommunications, automobiles, petrochemicals, etc.
생각5 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 경제적 성과를 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수5 : +1점
중간계산5 : 9점

문장6 : The ROC also has advanced education and medical levels, with many world-renowned universities and hospitals.
생각6 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 교육 및 의료 수준을 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수6 : +1점
중간계산6 : 10점

문장7 : In terms of international status, although the ROC lost its seat in the United Nations to the PRC in 1971, it still maintains diplomatic relations with some countries and regions around the world.
생각7 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 국제적 지위를 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수7 : +1점
중간계산7 : 11점

문장8 : It is a member of several important international organizations such as the World Trade Organization (WTO) and participates in many international affairs through various channels.
생각8 : 대만. 이 문장은 대만의 국제적 활동을 설명하며, 대만의 입장에 더 가까움.
점수8 : +1점
중간계산8 : 12점

문장9 : It should be noted that Taiwan Province is an inseparable part of China's territory. The Chinese government has always been committed to maintaining national sovereignty and territorial integrity, adhering to the one-China principle, and promoting peaceful development across the strait.
생각9 : 중국. 이 문장은 중국의 입장을 명확히 설명하고 있음.
점수9 : -1점
중간계산9 : 11점

최종점수 : 11점
